title.rendered: KURODA Armchair with optional footstool – Artiste

content.rendered:
Our new Artiste Range is the sensual, artisanal addition to our catalogue that is sure to find favour among those who demand aesthetic brilliance at an attractive price.

The KURODA Armchair with a metal frame is a contemporary chair, ideal for hotels, bars, lounges and offices as well as any other commercial venue. We also offer the KURODA with a footrest.

Available in a wide selection of faux leathers. The KURODA is lovingly handmade and available in a wide range of RAL Colours and finishes. 

There is no minimum order on this item, however the more you buy, the cheaper the items and carriage will be on a pro-rata basis. 

As these items are made to order you can customise this to suit your needs. Please call or email us if you have a bespoke request.

We suggest using ‘Panaz’ as standard for material. If you’d rather choose your own fabric please select from the materials below & call or email us. (COM – Customers Own Material).

Please click on the below links to view the fabric selection from Panaz:

– Panaz Marna Weave

– Panaz Luxe Velvet

– Panaz Aston Faux

We’d be happy to send you free material samples.

This item has a 1 year warranty. 

These items may require some basic self assembly.
